base_description: Tall, cylindrical gray trash can with pedal.
part_description: Includes a cylindrical body, flat lid, and foot pedal. The lid is on top, and the pedal is at the base front.
internal_interaction_description: Pressing the foot pedal causes a mechanism to lift the lid, allowing access to the interior. The lid is connected to the pedal by a lever system inside the can.
external_interaction_description: The trash can interacts with users by opening the lid when the pedal is pressed, allowing waste disposal. It remains stationary due to its cylindrical shape and weight distribution.
